snippet: The Harkness Foundation for Dance announced that it would distribute $5 million in grants over the next decade to five organizations that support dance.
abstract: Harkness Foundation for Dance says it will distribute $5 million in grants over decade to five organizations that support dance; recipients include the Brooklyn Academy of Music, Joyce Theater, City Center, 92nd Street Y and NYU Langone Medical Center’s Hospital for Joint Diseases.
lead_paragraph: The Harkness Foundation for Dance announced that it would distribute $5 million in grants over the next decade to five organizations that support dance.

headline.print_headline: $5 Million to Benefit New York Dance
headline.main: $5 Million to Benefit New York Dance

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York University Langone Medical Center
